body: Within reason, I'd like to start with "AMDGPU" first, and see how much difference is there. The current "GPU" device is deeply integrated with how NV GPU works. So it much safer to start separately. Once the features are completely, and we see the code is really almost identical, we can consider extend "GPU" to include "AMDGPU" as well.
